chart_description: This chart displays the rate of memory pages being paged from/to disk per second. This metric can help identify memory pressure in the system, where paging occurs when the system runs out of physical RAM and needs to move pages of memory between the RAM and disk.

dimension_descriptions.in: The rate of memory pages being read from disk into RAM per second.
dimension_descriptions.out: The rate of memory pages being written from RAM to disk per second.
